name: Last Organic Life - Prototype
description:
Hello ! 

Here is a first prototype of a space RTS game :D It's fun, it's small but it's free !

I want to make  a early access version before the end of 2019 if possible, and I plan on making a VR game out of it. Since 3D RTS looks awesome in VR :D

I made it using Unity ECS to get amazing performances.

Enjoy ! And comments or advises are welcome :) We will do what's possible in our available programming power.
